meaningMnemonic: Your 精神 is your spirit or your mind. If you add 的 to it, you get <vocabulary>mental</vocabulary>. It can mean <vocabulary>spiritual</vocabulary> too, but it more often shows up in reference to a person's mental or <vocabulary>emotional</vocabulary> state.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
